cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent

Class AgentContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.AgentContext

  • public class AgentContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a bot's contextual information. Bot's context will contain some basic information a bot can need. These are objects that are in his vision range. As well as some information taken from configurations like his lane, roles etc. This should be a primary source of information that the bot uses.
    Author:
    kocur

                                                       double dist)
        Finds entitites in radius around specified Location.
        Parameters:
        l - The location around which we are looking.
        dist - The radius.
        Returns:
        Returns all the entities that have distance to specified location less that the given radius.

        Returns:
        Returns entitites in a radius around the hero.

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(BaseEntity e,
                       Location l)
        Parameters:
        e - Entity with attack range.
        l - The location, that we want to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the location is in entity's range.

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(BaseEntity e,
                       int id)
        Check if location/entity with given id is in range of the given entity e.
        Parameters:
        e - Entity with attack range.
        id - Id of entity, that might be in range.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the entitty with given id is in range. False if not or if the location doesn't exist.

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(Location l1,
                       Location l2,
                       int range)
        Checks if the passed location l2 is in range of location l1.
        Parameters:
        l1 - First location.
        l2 - Second location. Is this location in range of l1??
        range - Range in which the locations should be.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the object is in range.

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(Location l1,
                       int id,
                       int castRange)
        Checks if the passed location l2 is in range of location with id id.
        Parameters:
        l1 - First location.
        id - Id of second location.
        castRange - Range in which the locations should be.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the object is in range.
